title: Live updates from the HR Derby
description: We have your one-stop shop for the most power-packed day of the baseball year.
author: ESPN

title: Report: Sternberg to sell Rays for $1.7 billion
description: Stu Sternberg has agreed in principle to a $1.7 billion deal to sell the Rays to a group led by a Florida-based developer Patrick Zalupski.

title: 'Jofra's back?' - analysing Archer's Test return
description: Jofra Archer says it was a "long" road back to Test cricket, but his performance is hugely encouraging for his and England's future, writes Matthew Henry.

title: Australia skittle Windies for 27 - lowest Test total for 70 years
description: Australia bowl out West Indies for just 27 - the second lowest score in Test history, and the worst since 1955 - to complete a 176-run win.

title: Taylor completes Serrano trilogy as Marshall suffers upset defeat
description: Katie Taylor beat Amanda Serrano by unanimous decision to defend the undisputed super-lightweight championship and complete a clean sweep of three victories in their trilogy.

title: Arsenal agree deal to sign Mosquera
description: Arsenal have agreed a deal with Valencia worth an initial £13m plus add-ons for defender Cristhian Mosquera.

title: Cooper Flagg, LeBron James' future highlight biggest takeaways from Las Vegas Summer League
description: With two versatile outings, Flagg proved he's more than hype — he's an NBA-ready player with a two-way game built for the modern league.
author: Dan Titus

title: NFL top 10 QBs: Kyler Murray misses the cut but gets votes
description: Some believe that Murray is a top10 quarterback in the NFL.
